name: Ruby on Rails 8 with Authentication
description: A Ruby on Rails 8 application with built-in authentication and Postgres database

services.name: web
services.startCommand: docker run -p 3000:3000 -e DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL -e RAILS_ENV=production -e RAILS_MASTER_KEY=$RAILS_MASTER_KEY web-app

secrets.name: RAILS_MASTER_KEY
secrets.description: The Rails master key for decrypting credentials
